DescriptionData.Title: Magic Coin Case Magic Tricks (12/Pack)
DescriptionData.Description: Pull out the slide from the plastic coin box and place a coin in the hole. The slide is replaced in the coin box, and when it is pulled out again, the coin has vanished! Easy to do. Great as a giveaway item.

DescriptionData.Title: Coil & Ring Magic Tricks
DescriptionData.Description: This one is so simple that you will be amazed at how your audience remains baffled every time. You and your assistant each have a coiled spring with a ring attached. You can detach your ring from the coil, but your subject never can! Switch the coils, switch back, the situation stays the same.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Coil and ring magic trick kit

DescriptionData.Title: Instant Change Tube
DescriptionData.Description: Change the color of a ribbon, change a dollar into quarters, change any small item into something else! 4 different effects included, but let your imagination go wild with this one! Approx. 7 inches tall. From Ickle Pickle.

DescriptionData.Title: Repeat Change Bags w/ zipper
DescriptionData.Description: Perform stunning vanishes or productions not once but twice without reloading! This economy repeating version has a lined velvet pouch with two secret compartments and a separate gimmicks for each. Assorted colors.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Multiple use velvet magic change bag
Allows for two consecutive change tricks
Gimmick action may not be as smooth as with traditional bags

DescriptionData.Title: Repeat Change Bags w/o zipper
DescriptionData.Description: Perform stunning vanishes or productions not once but twice without reloading! This economy repeating version has a lined velvet pouch with two secret compartments and a separate gimmicks for each. Assorted colors. Imported.

DescriptionData.Title: Deluxe Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: This ornate change bag has a velvet pouch that is fully lined with an easy to use, 2-handed gimmick. Red or gold-tone metal handle, sorry, no choice.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Red or gold-tone handle with fully-lined velvet pouch (Handle color may not be selected)

DescriptionData.Title: Zippered Egg Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: Flat folding rectangular bag has a zipper at the bottom and comes with a plastic egg. Follow the VERY easy instructions to make the egg "magically" appear or disappear. You can even open the zipper to show how completely empty the bag is! Use with the Go Go Vanisher (see below) to make the egg vanish for good! By Ickle Pickle.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes very easy to follow instructions
Can be used with the Go Go vanisher

DescriptionData.Title: Optical Wallet Card Tricks
DescriptionData.Description: A jack of hearts and nine of clubs are removed from a handsome black wallet. The nine is placed face down on the jack, and the magician announces that he will cause the nine to penetrate the jack. When the two cards are peeled apart, the ink on the face of the nine has disappeared - leaving a blank face card! The jack is turned over to reveal that the nine is now printed on its back! Supplied complete with specially printed Bicycle cards and the beautifully made prop, imported from France. Many other routines and effects are possible, a few highlighted in the illustrated instructions. The easiest card trick we've ever seen!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Optical illusion wallet card trick kit
Includes specially printed bicycle cards, a beautifully made prop, instructions, and routine variations

DescriptionData.Title: Bottomless Glass Magic Tricks
DescriptionData.Description: Durable Plastic glass with no bottom, good for dozens of excellent effects. Place the glass on your helper's hand, pour in some liquid, or crack an egg and the results go right through to his or her hand - what a mess! The perfect tool to vanish any small object

DescriptionData.Title: Blooming Flower Magic Tricks
DescriptionData.Description: The Blooming Flower or Blossom is a well known magician's prop, where a flower magically blooms on a bare stem. You can pretend to pluck off this flower and toss it away, only to have it reappear on the stem. The effect can be repeated as often as you like. Made of dyed feathers.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Blooming feather bouquet of flowers trick kit

DescriptionData.Title: The Birthday Present Magic Tricks
DescriptionData.Description: A crowd pleasing effect. Three different colored presents are shown - a red, a green and a yellow. All three are placed in a frame with an opaque front and clear back. The audience sees the front of the frame as two cards are pulled from the frame - the red present and the yellow. You then announce that the green present has vanished! The frame is turned around so the audience sees the back of one card still in the frame. This card is taken out of the frame and turned around and it reads, "GONE!"

DescriptionData.Title: Big Red Nose Magic Tricks
DescriptionData.Description: Here is a Christmas routine you can do straight out of the package! Rudy starts out as a blue-nose reindeer. The children object so you magically turn his nose to red. You like it better the other way but when you try to change it back, the color vanishes from the reindeer's nose. The children howl as the red nose ends up on you! Comes complete with routine and high quality, red foam nose.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Big red nose magic trick kit
Comes with routine instructions and high-quality red foam nose

DescriptionData.Title: Color-Changing Ball To Square Magic Tricks
DescriptionData.Description: A red colored ball is shown and placed in the left hand. It disappears, and is found in a pocket. The red ball is pushed into the left fist, and the spectator is asked where it is. The answer is always wrong because the right hand has a red cube and the left hand has a black ball.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Magic color changing ball to square trick kit
Comes with red ball, red cube, black cube, and instructions

DescriptionData.Title: Appearing Crayons Magic Tricks
DescriptionData.Description:
This is such a good idea! Start out doing the standard Coloring Book routine. Show the book blank; then have the black and white pictures appear; finally the pictures all color in by magic.
Now for the kicker! Ask the kids if they have any idea where all the colors came from. Of course, you'll get as many answers as there are kids in the audience. No matter, you explain that the colors came from your magic crayons! Roll the Coloring Book into a cylinder, a magic pass over the top, then pour out a bunch of real crayons. This looks great! Where did all the crayons cone from?
The Appearing Crayons is a self-contained, mechanical effect. It's easy to do, and it's the perfect finish to the Coloring Book or as a stand-alone trick. Comes with the special gimmick plus a bunch of crayons.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes instructions, self-contained mechanical effect device, and crayons
Great for finishing the coloring book act or as a stand-alone gimmick

DescriptionData.Title: Appearing 8 Foot Wand Magic Tricks
DescriptionData.Description:
Produce an 8 foot long magic wand from a hat, suitcase, or practically anywhere. Wand is black with white tips and looks great on stage. The possibilities are endless. Easy to do - learn it minutes after receiving it! Supplied complete with instructions. Made in the USA of strong, durable materials.
For best results, store unfurled and roll up just before use, or Wand may not fully close when extended. Note that red and yellow tape strips may fray or detach over time.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Strong long-lasting materials (Note that red and yellow tape strips may fray or detach over time)

DescriptionData.Title: Liquid From Newspaper Magic Tricks
DescriptionData.Description: A glassful of liquid is poured into the folded pages of a newspaper. When the paper is opened, not only are the pages dry but also the liquid is seen to have vanished completely! The newspaper is shown freely inside and out. If you wish you can even re-fold the newspaper and pour the liquid from the folded pages! Can easily be used for transformation - pour a glass of water into the folded pages and pour out a glass of milk or wine. Also use for silk changes: a red silk is placed into the paper, and you then pour in a glass of water; when the silk is removed it is white, and the water has turned red. Trick includes gimmick, newspaper and instructions.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Liquid from newspaper magic tricks kit
Can be used for a variety of newspaper and transformation tricks

DescriptionData.Title: Mini Tote Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: These flat, velvety change bags are perfect for small items. Great with Magic Silks. Mini Tote is approx. 6" tall x 5" wide; Assorted colors, by Ickle Pickle.

DescriptionData.Title: Itty Bitty Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: The Itty Bitty is our smallest traditional change bag. Just like our larger change bags, this wood handled velvet pouched bag is large enough to hold a silver dollar, small to medium silks, a mouthcoil, or a host of other small items you can find on our (Pocket Magic) page. Assorted colors, by Ickle Pickle.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Large enough to hold a silver dollar, small to medium silks, a mouth coil, or other small items

DescriptionData.Title: Deluxe Tote Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: These flat, velvety change bags are perfect for small items. It's perfect for many silk changes or vanishes. Deluxe Tote is approx. 10" x 8" wide. Assorted colors, by Ickle Pickle.

DescriptionData.Title: Tote Smiley Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: The Smiley Switch Bag by Sam Tee. These flat, colorful change bags are perfect for many silk changes (available on the (silks page)) or vanishes. Smiley Tote is approx. 9.5" tall x 8" wide;

DescriptionData.Title: Deluxe Tote Change Bags - Triple
DescriptionData.Description: These flat, velvety change bags are perfect for small items. We use ours for the MisMade Thank You (available on the (Magic Silks) page), but it's perfect for many silk changes or vanishes. Mini Tote is approx. 6" tall x 5" wide; Deluxe Tote is approx. 10" x 8" wide. Assorted colors, by Ickle Pickle.

DescriptionData.Title: Regular Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: This traditional high quality change bag has a velvet fully lined pouch with a strong wooden handle and easy to use gimmick. Assorted colors, by Ickle Pickle.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Wood handle with fully-lined velvet pouch

DescriptionData.Title: Zipper Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: Identical to the traditional change bag but with a zipper on one pocket of the bag that allows illusionist to pass a hand, or drop a silk or other item in the top and right out the bottom. Adds an even greater mystique to the illusion. Assorted colors, by Ickle Pickle.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Adds a wider variety of options to the traditional change bag

DescriptionData.Title: Spotty Change Bags - Black/White
DescriptionData.Description: A bag is shown to be empty inside. A solid black and a white silk is placed into the bag. When the silks are removed, the black silk has white spots, and the white silk has black spots. When the bag is now shown on the inside, there is a dog named "Spot"! By Ickle Pickle.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: White and black spot changing bags
For changing solid black and white silks to spotted black and white silks

DescriptionData.Title: Sparkle Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: Identical to the traditional change bag but made from sparkley fabric. Looks great under any light. Assorted colors, by Ickle Pickle.

DescriptionData.Title: Magic Clown Coloring Book - Royal Magic
DescriptionData.Description: A clown coloring book is shown to have all blank pages. Suddenly, with a wave of the magicians hand, pictures of clowns appear in the book, outlined in black. With audience participation, the magician takes the trick one step further. He colors the pictures - by magic. Now bright, vibrant colors have filled in the black and white pictures! For a fitting finale, all the pages change back to their original state - blank! The Royal Magic Clown Coloring book is the finest on the market. Changes from blank pages to outlined pages to colored drawings are made with the greatest of ease. If you can flip through a book, you can perform this astonishing trick! 11" x 8 1/2" in size, instructions included. Proudly made in the USA by Royal Magic.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Pages change from blank, to outlined pictures, to full-color pictures

DescriptionData.Title: Pocket-Sized Magic Coloring Book
DescriptionData.Description: A miniature coloring book (4.25" x 5.5") is shown to have all blank pages. Suddenly, with a wave of the magician's hand, pictures appear in the book, outlined in black! With audience participation, the magician takes the trick one step further and colors the pictures - by magic. Now bright, vibrant colors have filled in the black and white pictures! For a fitting finale, all the pages change back to their original state - blank! Changes from blank pages to outlined pages to colored drawings are made with the greatest of ease. If you can flip through a book, you can perform this astonishing trick! Proudly made in the USA by Royal Magic.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Pages change from blank, to outlined pictures, to full-color pictures

DescriptionData.Title: Clown Magic Coloring Book (Dummy)
DescriptionData.Description: "Dummy" (blank) coloring books come with the same cover as the Haines Magic Coloring Book (sold separately) can be passed around after the trick to enhance the illusion. 11" x 8 1/2" in size, just like the gimmicked version.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Blank books with the same cover as the magic clown coloring book

DescriptionData.Title: Clown Magic Coloring Book - Haines
DescriptionData.Description: The original Haines Magic Coloring Book in a clown and circus theme! As you flip through it, the book appears to have blank pages, then uncolored pictures, then colored pictures, as you perform your magic. "Dummy" (blank) coloring books with the same cover as their magic counterparts and be passed around to enhance the illusion (not included). 11" x 8 1/2" in size, instructions included.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Pages change from blank, to outlined pictures, to full-color pictures
Features a clown and circus theme

DescriptionData.Title: Holy Bible Magic Coloring Book
DescriptionData.Description: Holy Bible 3-way coloring book for the Sunday School Teacher or non-secular Clown. Stop on any page and tell the appropriate story. With a little magic, the pages are blank, show black and white drawings, or colored drawings! 11" x 8 1/2" in size, instructions included.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Pages change from blank, to outlined pictures, to full-color pictures

DescriptionData.Title: Bible Stores Magic Coloring Book - Royal Magic
DescriptionData.Description: A Bible Stories coloring book is shown to have all blank pages. Suddenly, with a wave of the magicians hand, pictures appear in the book, outlined in black. With audience participation, the magician takes the trick one step further. He colors the pictures - by magic. Now bright, vibrant colors have filled in the black and white pictures! For a fitting finale, all the pages change back to their original state - blank! The Royal Magic Bible Stories Coloring Book changes from blank pages to outlined pages to colored drawings are made with the greatest of ease. If you can flip through a book, you can perform this astonishing trick! 11" x 8 1/2" in size, instructions included.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Bible stories magic coloring book trick kit
Pages change from blank, to outlined pictures, to full-color pictures

DescriptionData.Title: Color Vision Magic Tricks
DescriptionData.Description: Here is an easy gag that will keep your audience puzzled and entertained. It's great for use with children and adults too. Ask the subject to choose one side (a picture/color) on a cube. Have him place it in a solid blue box. Put the lid on the box and put it behind your back, then put the box on your forehead. You then 'magically' read the subject's mind for the choice!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Color guessing magic trick box kit

DescriptionData.Title: D'lite Color Change Thumb tips - Regular Size (Single)
DescriptionData.Description: The next generation of D'Lite. This special D'Lite glows in bright red or green at your command. The D'Lite Color Change lets you easily display and manipulate a green or red light to produce different colored lights or change the color of one light to another. Also check out D'Lite II DVD. 1 regular size D'lite Color Change thumb tip per pack.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Regular sized Color Changing D'Lite thumb tip
Create the illusion of floating lights, lightening bugs, star swallowing, and more
D'Lite Thumb Tip glows and changes color on command
Also check out D'Lite II DVD

DescriptionData.Title: D'lite Morph Thumb tips - Regular Size (2/Pack)
DescriptionData.Description: This very special D'Lite first lights as a pale purple, then automatically cycles through a wide range of colors; such as: red, orange, green, then on to blue, pink and back to purple. This cycling continues for as long as the unit is activated. Even better, when this D'Lite is moved, it creates a unique strobe effect. 2 regular size D'lite Morph thumb tips per pack.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Regular sized Morph D'Lite thumb tip
Begins a pale purple cycles through a variety of colors
Creates a strobe effect when moved
Also check out D'Lite II DVD

DescriptionData.Title: D'lite Red Thumb tip - Regular Size (Pair)
DescriptionData.Description: D'Lite lighting thumbtips help you create the illusion of floating light, lightening bugs, swallowing a star and other fun light illusions. With just a small amount of practice this illusion can be very powerful. Also check out D'Lite II DVD. 2 regular size D'lite Red thumb tips per pack.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Regular sized Red D'Lite thumb tips
Create the illusion of floating lights, lightening bugs, star swallowing, and more
D'Lite Thumb Tips glow red on command
Also check out D'Lite II DVD

DescriptionData.Title: Jumbo Cubio Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: The Cubio is a wooden block that you hold up in front of your audience, allowing the cube to fall down along the string until you say "stop." Movement of the block down the string can be started and stopped on your command. It can be handed over to a spectator, who cannot control it by making it freeze midway, like the magician can. This larger model is made from solid wood (approx. 1.75" per side).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Jumbo magic stop and start cube trick kit

DescriptionData.Title: Counterfeit Detector Magic Tricks
DescriptionData.Description: A comical way of collecting money. Drop a borrowed bill into the top of the Counterfeit Detector. Then watch it visibly shred! Your victim, er, volunteer will gasp as their greenback is cut to ribbons in plain sight. Sound effects coming out of the detector add to the effect. Of course, the borrowed cash is unharmed, and can be reclaimed from the back of this novelty bank easily.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Pretends to detect counter fits and shred participants money

DescriptionData.Title: Small Confetti Bucket Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: This classic clown stunt can now be a part of your act... Pour water into this ordinary looking bucket, but when you throw it into your audience, it's only a bucketful of confetti! Great for audiences of all ages, self-working and very effective. Small Bucket is 6 inches tall and holds about 14 ounces. Instructions and routine ideas included.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Small Bucket is 6 inches tall and holds about 14 ounces

DescriptionData.Title: Large Confetti Bucket Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: This classic clown stunt can now be a part of your act... Pour water into this ordinary looking bucket, but when you throw it into your audience, it's only a bucketful of confetti! Great for audiences of all ages, self-working and very effective. Large Bucket is 9.5 inch tall and holds about 8 quarts.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Magic water to confetti conversion bucket trick kit
Large bucket is 9.5" tall and holds about 8 quarts, Small bucket is 6" tall and holds about 14 ounces, Mini bucket is 4 " tall and holds about 6 ounces

DescriptionData.Title: Mini Confetti Bucket Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: This classic clown stunt can now be a part of your act... Pour water into this ordinary looking bucket, but when you throw it into your audience, it's only a bucketful of confetti! Great for audiences of all ages, self-working and very effective. Mini Bucket is about 4 inches tall and holds just about 6 ounces. Instructions and routine ideas included.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Mini Bucket is about 4 inches tall and holds just about 6 ounces

DescriptionData.Title: Magic Coloring Book (Dummy/Blank)
DescriptionData.Description: "Dummy" (blank) coloring books with the same cover as the Royal Magic Coloring Book (sold separately) can be passed around after the trick to enhance the illusion. 11" x 8 1/2" in size, just like the gimmicked version.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Blank books with the same cover as the magic coloring books

DescriptionData.Title: Magic Coloring Book - Royal Magic
DescriptionData.Description: A coloring book is shown to have all blank pages. Suddenly, with a wave of the magicians hand, pictures appear in the book, outlined in black. With audience participation, the magician takes the trick one step further. He colors the pictures - by magic. Now bright, vibrant colors have filled in the black and white pictures! For a fitting finale, all the pages change back to their original state - blank! Changes from blank pages to outlined pages to colored drawings are made with the greatest of ease. If you can flip through a book, you can perform this astonishing trick! Proudly made in the USA by Royal Magic. "Dummy" (blank) coloring books with the same cover as their magic counterparts and be passed around to enhance the illusion (not included). 11" x 8 1/2" in size, instructions included.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Pages change from blank, to outlined pictures, to full-color pictures

DescriptionData.Title: Flame Book Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: Ignite your audiences with this blazing fire effect! As you open a seemingly normal book, a large and very visible flame is seen coming from within the opened book! Easy to perform and reset. Book has a plain black cover. Requires cigarette lighter fluid - not included. Must be 18 or older to purchase. Sorry, no Air Shipping on this item.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Requires lighter fluid to operate (not included)
Must be 18 or older to purchase

DescriptionData.Title: Fantastic Box Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: Make what you want appear or disappear! Show the box. Open it to show that it is empty, and place something in it. Close it, and you can instantly reopen the box to show that the items are gone! OR Show the box empty and reopen it full of silk, candy, pennies (a drawer full of loose pennies is really stunning!)...anything that will fit inside. Self-working trick. Full instructions included. 4" x 2.75" x 1.5" in size, assorted colors.

DescriptionData.Title: Enchanted Picture Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: A great, lightweight prop for kids shows, birthdays, anniversaries, family gatherings, etc. You display a jumbo sized card with the image of a flower pot with some bare stems in it. Turn it around, showing a normal back, then, turn it to the front again and the pot is filled with flowers! Really colorful, self-contained and easy to do! The floral theme is specially suited for birthdays or any celebration like anniversaries and festivals.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Great for birthdays, anniversaries, and festivals

DescriptionData.Title: Empty Box Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: A Red and Black box is displayed and the front and back are removed to show the empty frame. Then the front and back panels are replaced and you magically pull silks (or your choice of items) from within the "empty" box. About 4 inches tall. From Ickle Pickle.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Red and black empty box magic trick kit

DescriptionData.Title: Egg Nest Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: This colorful and eye-catching trick makes a great impact - everyone likes to the chance to win something for free! Show your audience five colorful plastic Easter eggs, and slip a gold coin, dollar bill or a ring into the one of the eggs (without showing which color egg has the item). Four people are invited to reach into the bag without looking and remove an egg, and you take the last egg. Of course the egg left for you is the one with the the valuables! Also a great way to give something special to the birthday child. Directions and ideas included. Very easy to do. Need some (Silly Rings)?

DescriptionData.Title: D'lite Red Thumb tip - Regular Size (1/pk)
DescriptionData.Description: The D'Lite lighting thumbtip help you create the illusion of floating light, lightening bugs, swallowing a star and other fun light illusions. With just a small amount of practice this illusion can be very powerful. Regular size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Regular sized Red D'Lite thumb tip
Create the illusion of floating lights, lightening bugs, star swallowing, and more
D'Lite Thumb Tip glows red on command
Also check out D'Lite II DVD

DescriptionData.Title: D'lite Blue Thumb tips - Regular Size (Single)
DescriptionData.Description: The blue D'Lite offers the potential for creative color changes and can work in situations where you would prefer a blue, as opposed to red light. D'Lite lighting thumbtips help you create the illusion of floating light, lightening bugs, swallowing a star and other fun light illusions. With just a small amount of practice this illusion can be very powerful. Also check out D'Lite II DVD. 1 regular size D'lite Blue thumb tip per pack.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Regular sized Blue D'Lite thumb tip
Create the illusion of floating lights, lightening bugs, star swallowing, and more
D'Lite Thump Tip glows blue on command
Also check out D'Lite II DVD
